subject: Automobiles
Automobile Racing
Le Mans Auto Race
lead_paragraph: The 24 Hours of Le Mans this weekend could well do for the hybrid car what it did for the diesel car and for many other technologies since its inception in 1923.
snippet: The 24 Hours of Le Mans this weekend could well do for the hybrid car what it did for the diesel car and for many other technologies since its inception in 1923.
